# mgc_dbaas_replicas (Resource)

Database replicas management.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "mgc_dbaas_replicas" "dbaas_replica" {
  name = "dbaas-replica"
  source_id = "123"
}
```

- `engine_id` (String) Engine unique identifier.
